text: Rebecca of Sunnybrook Farm is a 1938 musical-comedy movie. This is about a musically talented orphan named Rebecca Winstead. Her stepfather leaves her on a farm. Shirley Temple plays Rebecca. This movie was released in March 1938. The critical reviews were good. Category:1938 musical movies Category:1938 comedy movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:Movies set on farms Category:Movies about orphans Category:Movies directed by Allan Dwan
title: Rebecca of Sunnybrook Farm
